text: Donald Adeosun Faison (born June 22, 1974) is an American actor. He is best known for his leading role as Dr. Chris Turk in the ABC/NBC comedy-drama Scrubs (2001-2010) and a supporting role as Murray in both the movie Clueless and the television series of the same name. He also starred as Phil Chase in the TV Land sitcom The Exes (2011-2015). Faison also co-starred in the movies Waiting to Exhale (1995), Remember the Titans (2000), Uptown Girls (2003), Something New (2006), Next Day Air (2009) and Kick-Ass 2 (2013). ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors
title: Donald Faison
